name: MarvelAPI
tagline: C# wrapper for Marvel's REST API
body:
# Marvel API
Simple way to access Marvel's REST API. For full details on getting started with the Marvel API, go check out the [official website](https://developer.marvel.com/).

## Examples
### Create connection:
`_Marvel = new Marvel(_MarvelPublicKey, _MarvelPrivateKey)` 

### Get an individual character
`var characterId = 1009268; // Deadpool`
`var character = _Marvel.GetCharacter(characterId);`

### Get filtered list of characters
`var characters = _Marvel.GetCharacters();`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
